item.title: Designer Babies Are Teenagers Now—and Some of Them Need Therapy Because of It
item.description: “People don’t always realize they are creating a human being and not a piece of furniture.”

item.title: General Motors Cuts Funding to Cruise, Nixing Its Robotaxi Plan
item.description: The automaker has sunk billions into making a self-driving car service work. Now it says it will focus on “personal” autonomous vehicles instead.
